scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules && cd web3-server && rm -rf node_modules && cd .. && cd client && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.install: cd web3-server && yarn install && cd .. && cd client && yarn install
scripts.clean:build: cd web3-server && rm -rf cache && cd .. && cd client/src && rm -rf artifacts
scripts.build:server: yarn run clean:build && cd web3-server && yarn run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd web3-server && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run init:db && yarn run dev"
